title: The Darkstar skins
body:
_"The depths of space crawl with terrible entities, pray they ignore this world!"_ {{champion:136}} 

Well i guess they found it....

But it worries me that since i started playing 4 years ago (when Nami came out) Swain hasn't received a single skin, and this will be Varus' 5th skin since then. He gets 1.25 skins a year. Seems a little unfair, id love to find out how RIOT chooses (if they choose at all, and its not just a lottery) which champions get skins. 
in any case both Darkstar skins look epic as!

Although Darkstar {{champion:136}} was a missed opportunity, even if it is a bit 'obvious'.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Annie Bots Wife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=s7b9Eqbb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-02T06:16:54.246+0000)
>
> Annie needs more skins.

And Teemo.

They did an interview with a Rioter the start of last year about how skins are made. From what i can recall, the Rioters basically come up with cool skin ideas and then a group decides if the idea is cool enough, fits the champion and is worthwhile making.

For this particular skin set, someone had a cool idea for a Thresh skin and Riot thought that Varus fit well with this "dark star" theme.

When asked why Varus:

> Riot KateyKhaos "Varus fits well within the Dark Star alt-fantasy because it highlights his descent into darkness, but takes it that extra notch further. He’s not only corrupted, he’s completely consumed by the Dark Star’s twisted power!"
